thread.title: What 1 Woman Did After Being Fat Shamed by Other Women at the Gym
thread.title_full: What 1 Woman Did After Being Fat Shamed by Other Women at the Gym

author: Jenny Sugar
title: What 1 Woman Did After Being Fat Shamed by Other Women at the Gym
text:
Woman's Response to Being Fat Shamed at the Gym What 1 Woman Did After Being Fat Shamed by Other Women at the Gym January 6, 2017 by Jenny Sugar 177 Shares 
'Tis the season for newbie gym goers making New Year's resolutions to lose weight and get strong and healthy. If you've noticed a few new people hitting up the gym — heck, maybe you're even one of them — then this woman's amazing response to being body shamed her first week back at the gym will inspire you to be more supportive of others and to keep at your fitness goals.
